div.p: Blue Bay Dive & Watersports is located on Blue Bay Resort. Experience the comfort of our luxury accommodations, eat at excellent restaurants, play on our golf course, hike, enjoy live music on the beach, play tennis AND dive on the pristine coral reefs of Curacao. With several hotels on the resort, there is a choice for everyone. Enjoy a great deal with diving combined!

Blue Bay Curaçao Golf & Beach Resort is a unique place where Curaçao is at its best. At Blue Bay Resort there is an amazing 18 hole golf course that is available for everyone, from beginner to advanced. Many have learned to play golf here and have become addicted to this course. More experienced players (and often international pros) happily find their way to the attractive and fun tournaments.

Besides playing golf, you could enjoy laying on the beach. Blue Bay Beach offers multiple facilities to its guests, such as a restaurant, where you can have lunch and dinner. There is a separate bar which offers drinks and finger foods. As for the beach itself, there is plenty of chances to catch some sun and shade when relaxing on the sunbeds. The beach offers their guest a nice sandy entrance from the beach to the sea to cool off. And with the dive shop located directly on the beach, Scuba Diving and snorkeling is just a step away.
Check out our Dive & Stay Specials on the Dive Division Travel Page. Please contact dive@bluebay-curacao.com for all the up-to-date deals.
